plot: In a remote village, Oshan lives his life without any connection to the outside world. However Oshan has a dream; he wishes to download the latest music hits from his long time hero, &"The King&". Oshan's patience and devotion are put to the test as he completely changes his perspective on technology.
title: This Side Up
